SELECT c.url AS url,vr.content_id,
c.title, c.title_image_url,
c.name as title, c.image_url as imageUrl,c.actor as author,
c.name as title,c.image_url as imageUrl,c.singer as author,
c.name as title,c.image_url as imageUrl,c.author as author,
count(vr.id) AS count FROM cms_content_visit_record AS vr left JOIN
cms_content
cms_video
cms_audio
cms_novel
as c ON c.id = vr.content_id
LEFT JOIN cms_channel AS ch ON ch.id = vr.channel_id
LEFT JOIN cms_site AS s ON s.id = ch.site_id
WHERE c.is_html=1
and vr.visit_time > #{date}
AND vr.channel_type = #{channelType} AND vr.content_id is not null
AND (vr.channel_id = #{channelId} or ch.pid = #{channelId})
AND s.id = #{siteId}
GROUP BY vr.content_id ORDER BY count DESC
select count(*) from cms_content_visit_record where content_id = #{cmsContentId,jdbcType=INTEGER} and channel_type = #{channelType}
